articles.description: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.
articles.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Fortress CEO Scott Purcell said Ripple wants to stick with its current B2B focus.
articles.title: Fortress CEO Responds to Ripple Backing Out of Acquisition

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Alongside layoffs, Epic Games is also raising the price of Fortnite’s in-game currency, citing inflation and currency shifts.
articles.title: Epic Games Is Jacking Up the Price of Fortnite V-Bucks

articles.author: Stephanie Hirschmiller
articles.description: Anrealage delivered a head-turning runway at Paris Fashion Week, spotlighting designer Kunihiko Morinaga's latest color-changing outfits.
articles.title: These Paris Fashion Week Outfits Transform Under Ultraviolet Light

articles.description: Gemini described the withdrawal as an attempt to bulk up Gemini Earn’s liquidity reserves.
articles.title: Gemini Calls Description of $218 Million Genesis Withdrawal ‘Pure Fantasy’

articles.description: These are the big players you should know before tuning into Sam Bankman-Fried's trial next week.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Trial: All the Names You Need to Know

articles.description: Epic CEO Tim Sweeney said the Fortnite studio is going through “a major structural change” due to tighter margins and new revenue models.
articles.title: Fortnite Maker Epic Games Cuts 830 Staff as CEO Calls Layoffs 'Only Way'

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The first launch of an Ethereum ETF in the United States appears imminent, but VanEck didn't provide a specific date.
articles.title: Ethereum Futures ETF to Begin Trading as Rumors Swirl of Accelerated SEC Approvals

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: After working with Adidas, 9dcc, and more, IYK has launched a self-serve platform for creating NFC-chipped products.
articles.title: IYK Raises $16.8 Million to Power Token-Enabled Fashion With NFTs

articles.author: Robert Stevens,Scott Chipolina
articles.description: Futures contracts have a long and storied history—but for Bitcoin traders, they’ve unlocked new strategies.
articles.title: What Are Crypto Futures, Coinbase's Latest Offering?

articles.description: The crypto exchange has set its sights on global expansion amid ongoing legal challenges from the SEC in the U.S.
articles.title: Coinbase Rolls Out Futures Trading for Retail Crypto Traders Globally

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: As part of the recent sale, Binance CEO said that “a few ex-Binance CIS team members” may join the CommEx team.
articles.title: Binance Chief Says Former Russia Unit CommEx 'Does Not Service US or EU Users'

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Though VanEck and Ark Invest have been hit with delays, a futures-based ETF could see approval by next week.
articles.title: SEC Extends Deadline for Ark Invest, VanEck Spot Ethereum ETF Filings

articles.author: Daniel Dob
articles.description: CBDCs promise to energise economic growth through greater efficiency and security—at the cost of enshrining fiat’s dominance.
articles.title: What Price for Your Money? Liberty, Security, and CBDCs

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Following Paysafe's unilateral split from Binance, users are advised to move their euro balances to Tether’s USDT.
articles.title: Binance Urges Euro Users to Convert to Tether After Bank Partnership Ends

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Amid falling bridges and staking cartels, industry experts like the Chainlink co-founder are again debating the age-old question of decentralization.
articles.title: Only Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Chainlink Are Meaningfully Decentralized: Sergey Nazarov

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The expansion follows Tezos’ “Mumbai” upgrade earlier this year.
articles.title: Crypto Platform Fireblocks Expands Institutional Access to Tezos

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: “It is simply unacceptable that unclear or outdated legal frameworks could hinder [CBDC] deployment,” said BIS General Manager Agustín Carstens.
articles.title: The Law Must Evolve To Make CBDCs Possible, Says BIS Chief

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The I in AI is now making its way into U.S. intelligence agencies. The CIA announced it has begun creating its own AI chatbot much like the wildly popular ChatGPT. Nameless for now, the tool will be trained on publicly available data and aims to help U.S. spies to quickly verify information. Bloomberg reported that […]
articles.title: Yes, the CIA Is Building an AI Chatbot

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Mixed reality at a fraction of the price of the Apple Vision Pro. Will it be worth it? Here’s the latest on the Meta Quest 3.
articles.title: Meta Quest 3: Everything You Need to Know

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: UPDATE: Microsoft's documents suggest an Xbox crypto wallet. Here's what we know so far about the next-gen Xbox hardware.
articles.title: Next-Gen Xbox: Everything You Need to Know From Microsoft Leaks

articles.description: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.
articles.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: SAG-AFTRA's fight for proper compensation continues as the WGA strike concludes.
articles.title: SAG-AFTRA Strike Continues Amid Ongoing Concerns Over AI in Hollywood

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: U.S. Representative Ritchie Torres questioned Gensler, using Pokémon cards as an example—and told Decrypt the SEC Chair's responses were "incoherent."
articles.title: Is a Tokenized Pokémon Card a Security? SEC Chair Gary Gensler Responds—Kinda

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: UPDATE: Leakers say that a pair of massive games are headed to the Switch 2. Here's the latest on the next Nintendo console.
articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: Everything You Need to Know

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Marathon (MARA) shares have dipped 2.9% since the accident occurred.
articles.title: Marathon Mined an Invalid Bitcoin Block—Here's What That Means

articles.description: “AI is shaping the way we build the metaverse,” said Chief Technology Officer Andrew Bosworth.
articles.title: Meta Unveils Glasses, Chatbots, Image Editing Powered by AI

articles.author: Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: The ability to search for current information was taken offline earlier this year when it was being used to bypass paywalls.
articles.title: OpenAI's ChatGPT Now Searches the Web in Real Time—Again

articles.author: Decrypt AI, Edited by Ryan Ozawa
articles.description: In an interview with Bloomberg, Kernel founder Bryan Johnson says simple changes can extend our lives.
articles.title: Longevity Starts With Ending ‘Self-Destructive Behavior', Says Anti-Aging Obsessed Billionaire

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Documents published by Microsoft in the FTC case reveal plans for an Xbox crypto wallet. Will it still happen? Here's what we know.
articles.title: Xbox Goes Crypto? Leaked Microsoft Roadmap Includes Wallet Plans

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: The Lumerin Hashpower Marketplace creates a novel method for decentralizing Bitcoin's global hashrate and makes mining accessible to retail investors.
articles.title: You Can Now Trade Bitcoin Mining Hashpower on Arbitrum

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: At a Wednesday hearing, Congressman Tom Emmer told the SEC chair that he is not an impartial regulator for crypto.
articles.title: Pro-Crypto Lawmakers Blast Gensler for 'Loyalty' to Big Banks

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: The basketball player used to reach out to Bitcoiners to offer them tickets to his NBA games. “Some people thought I was scamming them,” he told Decrypt.
articles.title: Former NBA Champion Matthew Dellavedova Joins Swan Bitcoin

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Maple Finance’s Sidney Powell said that managing counterparty risk is now key in the industry.
articles.title: How the Three Arrows Collapse Changed Ethereum DeFi Lending

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: The tech giant says its new platform, Cloudflare AI, allows developers to build scalable AI applications quickly and affordably.
articles.title: Cloudflare Launches AI Platform to Support Scalable AI Applications

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: With Treasury notes hitting levels not seen since 2007, DeFi protocols tapping the real-world asset trend are on the rise.
articles.title: DeFi Tokens Buck Bearish Market Trend as Bond Yields Soar

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: The oracle platform has integrated its CCIP communication protocol with Base to enable the development of cross-chain dapps and services.
articles.title: Chainlink Extends Cross-Chain Protocol to Coinbase’s Base

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: The new agreement includes clear guidelines regarding the use of artificial intelligence in the film and TV industry.
articles.title: Hollywood Writers End Strike Following Successful Agreement Negotiations

articles.author: Reza Jafery
articles.description: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.
articles.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2

articles.description: David Gogel of dYdX discusses how the decentralized exchange is building a custom blockchain to fully decentralize derivatives trading. He explained how the new dYdX chain will allow validators to run order books in memory, enabling decentralized order matching at scale. This shift aims to increase security and transparency for traders while maintaining the performance of centralized exchanges.
articles.title: Decentralize Derivatives Trading with Custom Blockchain

articles.description: Solana has improved network reliability through upgrades like Quick and local fee markets. It recently partnered with Visa to allow settling transactions in USDC on Solana. This could enable merchants to receive instant payments and save on credit card processing fees. Stacy Elliott spoke with Austin Federa, Head of Strategy for the Solana Foundation, at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Newly Partnered with Visa, Solana Focuses on Reliability

articles.description: As India figures out its regulatory approach to the crypto industry, one thing is clear to Shardeum co-founder Nischal Shetty: “If you're a high-frequency trader, you can't afford to lose a percentage every time you sell,” he told Decrypt's Andre Beganski at Messari Mainnet in New York. “That's something that's caused a lot of issues.”
articles.title: India's 1% Crypto Tax Has Been a Nightmare for High-Frequency Traders, Says Shardeum CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Ledger CEO Pascal Gauthier to discuss crypto custody post-FTX, and the hardware wallet manufacturer's controversial Ledger Recover service.
articles.title: Most Crypto Users Don't Trust Themselves to Keep Their Seed Phrase Safe: Ledger CEO

articles.description: As crypto matures, accounting and tax regulations are evolving. Amy Kalnoki of Bitwave explains how her company helps crypto companies properly account for digital assets. She notes the importance of flexibility as new crypto assets emerge and regulations change. Stacy Elliott interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Crypto Accounting Challenges and Opportunities

articles.description: Coinbase's Jesse Pollak, creator of layer-2 blockchain Base, says the launch of the network has exceeded expectations, even if plans changed along the way. He believes Arbitrum One will help bring billions onto blockchain by enabling seamless user experiences. Stacy Elliott interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Base as a 'Bridge, Not an Island'

articles.description: Paul Brody drives Ernst & Young (EY) initiatives and investments in blockchain technology across consulting, audit, and tax business lines. He says enterprise blockchain adoption is nearing an inflection point. Brody believes blockchains will one day handle 40 billion transactions daily across industries like automotive and pharma. Stacy Elliott interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Explosive Growth Ahead for Enterprise Blockchain

articles.description: Dave Weisberger, Co-Founder and CEO of CoinRoutes, argued that excessive regulation in the U.S. threatens to undermine the country's long-standing dominance in global financial markets. He warned that other countries are embracing blockchain and crypto to build more efficient digital markets, which could cause the US to lose its competitive edge and trillions in GDP. Weisberger said CoinRoutes is now focusing more on expanding internationally due to restrictive policies in the U.S. He was interviewed by André Beganski of Decrypt at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Regulation Threatens U.S. Dominance of Financial Markets, Says CoinRoutes CEO

articles.description: Daniel Helm, head of Developer Relations at Scroll, discussess how they are building a zkRollup to scale Ethereum transactions and lower fees. He explained their focus on creating a seamless developer experience by maintaining Ethereum's ethos and tooling. Scroll aims to launch their mainnet soon, providing more scalable blockspace for Ethereum developers. Stacy Elliott of Decrypt interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Building a Developer-Friendly zkRollup to Scale Ethereum

articles.description: Rich Rines, original Core DAO contributor and former Coinbase engineer, discusses how the narrative around Bitcoin is shifting in 2023. While Bitcoin remains digital gold, new layer 2 solutions are emerging to unlock more utility and value from the huge amounts of capital stored in Bitcoin. He says these innovations can benefit Bitcoin holders while keeping Bitcoin maximalists happy by building outside the base layer. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Bitcoin's Narrative Is Shifting Towards Layer-2 Solutions

articles.description: Decrypt's Stacy Elliott sat down with Robinhood Crypto general manager Johann Kerbrat at Messari Mainnet 2023, to talk about the trading platform's crypto wallet, onboarding new users through simplicity, and keeping platform fees sustainable.
articles.title: We Need to Start Thinking About How we Make Crypto Easy to Use: Robinhood Crypto General Manager

articles.description: Jack O'Holleran is CEO and co-founder of SKALE Labs. He explains how on-chain gaming is ready for the mainstream after overcoming early challenges like high fees and poor user experience. Companies can now build blockchain games that look and feel like traditional games, and scalability improvements allow games to support hundreds of millions of players without performance issues. He was interviewed by André Beganski at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: On-Chain Gaming Poised for Mass Adoption

articles.description: Billy Sebell of the XDC Foundation discussed the proliferation of new layer-1 and layer-2 blockchain solutions. While this expands possibilities, he noted projects must still attract users amidst growing competition. Sebell highlighted the benefits of targeting niche use cases and bringing real-world assets on-chain via tokenization. He was interviewed by André Beganski of Decrypt at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: New Blockchains Boom Creates Opportunity and Challenges

articles.description: Dave Lemke is the CFO & CCO at Giddy, creators of a crypto wallet with decentralized private key security. He explains how their solution allows self-custody while still being recoverable. He highlighted increasing demand for self-custody after the FTX collapse. Lemke also touched on upcoming US crypto regulations and Getty's roadmap to simplify staking and other complex processes. Stacy Elliott interviewed him at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Accessible Self-Custody for Crypto

articles.description: Amanda Tuminelli of the Defi Education Fund discusses the need for sensible crypto regulation. She says regulators should work with the industry to understand how protocols work before proposing expansive rules that could stifle innovation. Stacy Elliott of Decrypt interviewed her at Messari Mainnet 2023.
articles.title: Defi Education Fund Advocates for Responsible Crypto Regulation

articles.description: What is AI Arena? Decrypt's Kate Irwin dives into the upcoming video game in an interview with the game's founders, AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie.
articles.title: Train Your Own AI-Powered Fighter? Inside AI Arena

articles.description: Sidney Powell, co-founder of DeFi lender Maple Finance, sits down with Decrypt reporter André Beganski to talk risk management in DeFi and how the crypto lending and borrowing landscape has changed within the last year.
articles.title: DeFi Lenders and Borrowers Are More Cautious Than Ever. Maple Finance's Sidney Powell Explains Why
